snippet: The Supreme Court refused to expand its reasoning in the Citizens United case, which relaxed restrictions on corporate and labor political donations, to allow campaign spending by foreigners.
abstract: The Supreme Court refused to expand its reasoning in the Citizens United case, which relaxed restrictions on corporate and labor political donations, to allow campaign spending by foreigners.
lead_paragraph: In a terse four words, the Supreme Court on Monday issued an order upholding prohibitions against foreigners making contributions to influence American elections.

headline.main: Supreme Court Retains Ban on Foreign Campaign Donations
